Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The aim of the present study was to investigate the protective effect of the Solidago virgaurea extract on isoproterenol - induced cardiotoxicity in rats .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Solidago virgaurea extract |
| Isoproterenol |
| Induced cardiotoxicity |

In the given paragraph, "Solidago virgaurea extract" is the chemical entity being investigated for its protective effect against "isoproterenol-induced cardiotoxicity". Isoproterenol is the chemical causing the cardiotoxicity in rats.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Solidago virgaurea extract |
| Isoproterenol |

In the given paragraph, "Solidago virgaurea extract" and "Isoproterenol" are the only entities that clearly refer to chemicals. The term "cardiotoxicity" refers to a toxic effect on the heart, but it is not a specific chemical compound.
